name: 2.1.4.Final
body:
- [**closed**] maven build error  [#2081](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2081)
- [**Enhancement**][**2.1.x**] Implement *Optional* authenticated read access. [#2069](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2069)
- [**closed**] Cannot build exportV1 tool after release 2.1.0 [#2024](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2024)
- [**Bug**][**2.1.x**] Kafka SQL storage contentId and globalId message keys not unique [#1993](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1993)
- [**Bug**] CCompat Layer SchemaType with JSON [#1905](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1905)
- [**closed**] Remove kotlin extension [#1890](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1890)
- [**2.1.x**] Security: Resteasy vulnerabilities [#1808](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1808)
- [**2.1.x**] Security: Netty vulnerabilities [#1807](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1807)
